response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in innovation, efficiency, and unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and market value, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $2,000,000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your potential as a discerning buyer who appreciates the true value of high-quality solutions. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 2000000}
